documents.document: Justin Bieber is back on instagram and my life feels complete again
@LizBallmaier @samlandreth @EmBallmaier SCREAMING FOR ALL THREE OF YOU!!!!
my brother: " I should really wash my work clothes" me: *finds brothers work clothes in my laundry basket*
as a couple walks separate directions in target to begin their shopping, she says, "see you in a few years sweetheart"
I grip my coffee tight and talk to it everyday... like it is something that might save me
another year marking the loss of my best friend. doing life without you is at times so empty, but I smile, proud to hold your memory.
and when you don't think you can do anymore - try once more
@lastkevstanding bahaha! I don't recommend children try it, but I made it work! My shirt is dry! Blessings!!
@MisstaJay haha! It survived! 45 seconds at a time! Woo!!! I have a shirt again!
do you think if i put my shirt in the microwave to dry it will catch fire?
you are not chained to the secrets you create. find freedom in that

get to the gym. realize my pants are on backwards. this. is. my. life.
coffee delivery, anyone?!
brushing your teeth to then quickly drink your coffee.... wouldn't suggest it
Saying "yes" to Jesus and not to the world is possibly the toughest decision I've had to make. Even still, it is well with my soul.
I gotta get out of my own head
@HelloDannyOwens SYM = save your money. and that is easy when you're not spending it on gas ðŸ˜›
Life hack: eat while walking around the appie table. Makes it look like you took less.
@hannahaspen_ we all good! made it out strong, haha.
@hannahaspen_ current status: lying on the gym floor letting my heart calm its beating, lol, whoops
8 shots of espresso at 8:30pm was not my best life decision.
Watching couples fight at the gym is my Monday morning entertainment
I bought my first pair of sweat pants yesterday. The word cozy has completely new meaning now
My dyer has read,"9 minutes remaining" for the last 20 minutes
@EmBallmaier i laughed SO HARD when he walked over and gave me the dollar. #dead
Every time my co-worker makes a sexual joke towards me..he owes me 25 cents. I earned this dollar in less than 5 miâ€¦ https://t.co/mWpHZ4AIIw
*spends 35 dollars more to get that 7 dollar shipping for free*
@EmBallmaier guy at the gym with the last name deol..and wearing a sweater to rep it. It only has me thinking about that salad tho
all the newbies here at the gym thinking, "new year, new me"
@SandyJoJohnston dang! A note would have been easier than talking! Wish I thought of that sooner!
current aesthetic: gripping 4 mini ice cream buckets, a bottle of wine, 3 choco bars, and a bag of gold fish. 2017 diet is coming in hot
@ImStephRivera haha, got off the train about an hour ago!
@ImStephRivera I'll never know. I couldn't bring myself to do it! I tried to do it- I did try!
@EmBallmaier LOL. My stop is in 2 minutes. Not enough time! The love story ends here
UPDATE: he is on my train back to Canada and I am currently hiding the furthest back seat. https://t.co/JqGmyJY6Vm
Crashed straight into the cutest guy at the train station and in my flustered state... I looked up at him and said, "thank-you" #dead
Guy didn't lock the washroom door on the train. Walking in on him was like walking in on 2017, wild
@pizza , blessing us since birth https://t.co/l5e2H1mbfO
@hannahaspen_ On my way!
Dancing with myself: 2017
@samlandreth @EvanDalen @LizBallmaier @EmBallmaier MY HEART CANT WAIT
Moms in McDonalds lobby giving dinner threats: "you're not getting any ice cream unless you finish your french fries" ðŸ˜‚
Out here surrounded by Christmas lights and I just see everyone out here holding their spouses and suddenly I feel cold.
wrapping all those Christmas gifts thinking, "man, these are so good... I wish I was gifting them to myself"
@ioegreer @ScottBorrero S A M E! ðŸ˜­ this is so good!
feeling rebellious of all sorts. I just walked through IKEA backwards
I'm sitting here wishing for chocolate, and honestly, I don't even really like chocolate.
boys. the reason wine was invented.
My 19 year old sister: "mom, guess what I did today?" Mom: "you woke up by yourself today?"
@EmBallmaier bless you! ðŸ˜‚
how many times is hitting snooze too many times? .... asking for a friend
my hedgehog, Fred, hasn't been eating the last 4 days. Please pray for Fred. ðŸ˜­
@Davidgr30431023 lol. Was thinking "all alone April", really.ðŸ˜‚
@couldyouclarify #lifethough This honestly made me laugh so hard
2016 and my future 2017. Because same https://t.co/1TEv6Jo1IJ
*eats entire family size chip bag to hide evidence that I opened it*
in a state of missing @EmBallmaier https://t.co/HYk4ORfmye
Woke up dead from laughter. RT to save a live @EmBallmaier
when you think you know someone, but your whole relationship has been a lie.
*usually leaves 10 minutes before starting work.* never been late. Today, *leaves 45 minutes before starting work* arrives late.
I just spent 50 dollars on hedgehog toys. I don't even give myself that much luxury
last night: lost my phone. Went back 2 mcdonalds 20 min later to find it...found it in the trash can inside my folded up to-go back. LOL HOW
IMPATIENTLY WAITING https://t.co/6pfM4scPtM
a huge shoutout to melatonin. Thanks for bringing sleep back to the schedule
I work at a pool and the entire water polo team just dabbed at me on their way out, one by one.
I showered today. It is going to be a good day
My room adequately resembles my mind. something similar to what the after math of a nuclear bomb might look like.
this whole being patient thing is wearing me thin. I could use a nap
guy at the gym fell asleep on the stretching mats, but honestly, same.
Goals, really https://t.co/m9rhHL0ojL
This. Is. Everything. https://t.co/RxmsllxQPv
Same though ðŸ˜‚ https://t.co/jnOMi55W3K
@vllmnn I actually sleep when it feels like home
@HelloDannyOwens easier said than done
current mood: https://t.co/wRLx0p1zE1
@lastkevstanding haha!!!! ok, fine! I'll be #basic when it isn't popular anymore ðŸ˜‚
just purchased 200 dollars worth of gym attire. Eats McDonald's for dinner.
I took a "how basic are you" test last night and only scored 20%. And like, honestly, I'm disappointed in myself.
What better way to live than for others to feel Christ through our own lives, the Glory of God
"It is so pretty I could drool" ...."I just wish I could drool on command so you could see my emotions right now"
low key screaming over here because this basic white girl is ready for Christmas! 1 month away!
"I hope you have a great night with me on your mind." and that is all she wrote.
I just want bad gas station coffee, a tank full of gas, and a heart full of you
it's raining.... quick! let's all suddenly forget how to drive
the bus driver is swinging his hips and singing his 1968 CD jams. I already love this shuttle ride.
I have a hard time looking people in the eyes. I feel like they are reading my soul.
it is a shame to see how "social fame" can quickly changes a persons character. It makes me wonder where their heart stood this whole time.
I saw a girl my age with a flip phone today and for a minute I wanted to be her. I miss the simplicity of this social world.
@EmBallmaier YEAS YOU ARE
throw them middle fingers up- it's Friday! https://t.co/1PT7seQWjF
last night: met up w/ 2 strangers. got chased by the cops. lost my phone at the "crime scene"... forcing us to return like ninjas. #living
random post:the last few days my eyes have been almost completely swollen shut & docs dont know why. It is very painful& prayer would b nice
I feel like I woke up from a terrible nightmare, so, I am going to close my eyes and someone wake me when there is better news#Election2016
@cbrookesmith amen! I was getting real bored, lol!
when the person you were supposed to meet 30 minutes prior says "2 away" and then takes another 20 to arrive. It's fine...
he said to me... "look at this brick wall... can I be a hipster now?" https://t.co/bJratUQvY2
@samlandreth it is allowed! Always allowed. bb bois always play. ðŸ˜‚
@samlandreth LOL! This is my life. can't a girl just feel for no given reason?!
if rhi rhi and drake can't keep love alive... what even is love? #realtalk
Dinner conversations: Mom: "we just sold a 42" TV why are you looking at 55" TVS?" Dad: "because I'm blind and I could see on the 42"
@HelloDannyOwens no, I really don't! But I want to get it!
